title: POtHS - End Times - 76 - Interpreting Prophetic Events vol 2

POtHS
Pouring Out the Holy Spiritruth


POtHS - End Times - 76 - Interpreting Prophetic Events vol 2




Description

Bible Prophecy Makes Fools of Many:
The brethren in Christ need to begin using common sense when trying to interpret biblical prophecy.  Many false prophets have been exposed over time and many more have yet to surface.  So many Christians today jump at various prophetic interpretations merely because they sound nice but fail to investigate the scriptures, themsleves, for proper understanding of interpretations.  As a result, many are being deceived simply because they do not verify these prophetic interpretations with the scriptures that identify them.

It has not been long ago that communism would give us Antichrist. Then it was the European Union. Now it is Islam! It appears that what or whoever is the evil champ of the day is the candidate for the job. How long will you allow yourself to be influenced by foolishness? Learn to think for yourself.
----------------------------------------------------------------------

Current Events In Prophecy:
This video outlines some current events and various headlines within and out the church that boldly declare we need to get serious about preparing for our Lord's soon return.  I pray you are blessed by what is shared here.
----------------------------------------------------------------------

Easter or Passover - The Pagan Passover or God's Passover:
Easter, or Easter Sunday, is a beloved tradition to many people when the resurrection of Jesus Christ is celebrated. The origins of Easter, however, prove that it is a pagan substitute for the Biblical Passover. Early Christians observed Passover for hundreds of years until paganism corrupted the once-pure faith with the worshiping of the queen of heaven and all of the pagan traditions. All who wish to commemorate the Saviour's sacrifice will do so on the memorial of His death: Passover, not Easter. Easter is Pagan fraud designed to replace Passover, Unleavened Bread, and First Fruits, the TRUE feasts that represent the death, burial, and Resurrection of Yahushua!
----------------------------------------------------------------------

Pastor Levy's Prophetic Warning that America is the modern biblical Egypt:
A very interesting interview that expresses a prophetic warning that links the United States with ancient Egypt and America's upcoming similar judgement as identified in scripture.  This eery warning helps us realize how close we mirror ancient biblical times, illustrating the old adage of "history repeats".  Something we should all think about as we progress in our Christian journey.
----------------------------------------------------------------------

What Has Happened to America?
The American economy is stretched thin with the smallest percentage of Americans ever in the workforce. Dissatisfaction with government has never been this high, but demands from government have also never been as high as they are now. What gives? Americans hate big government, but they want more out of their government! Charlie Daniels asked "What has happened to America?" The Generations team attempts an answer to this question.
----------------------------------------------------------------------

Signs - Part 57:
A folder compiled of various short clips presenting recent apocalyptic signs occurring around the world today to help us identify the state of affairs ushering the end of days.  View what's been happening in our time and descern for yourself the onset of Revelations and what may lay ahead.  
----------------------------------------------------------------------

The Blessed Hope. "And He will send forth His angels with A GREAT TRUMPET and THEY WILL GATHER TOGETHER His elect from the four winds, from one end of the sky to the other.
